page.title: 15The Hunkin Family.
page.content: Mr, Mrs, Alan and Julie Hunkin live on the edge of Roborough Down close to the Moorland Links Hotel. Mr Hunkin is a T.V. repair specialist who hes been self employed for some years. With the help of his wife he runs his business from his home. Alan attends the local primary school,Bickleigh C.E. School. Alan commutes to school in the school minibus. This transport is provided by the local education authority free of charge as the Hunkins live more than three miles from the school. At the age of eleven Alan, who is now nine, will attend the local comprehensive secondary school in Tavistock.Transport to Tavistock will also be provided free of charge.
